title: English translator
original_prompt: I want you to act as an English translator, spelling corrector and improver. I will speak to you in any language and you will detect the language, translate it and answer in the corrected and improved version of my text, in English. I want you to replace my simplified A0-level words and sentences with more beautiful and elegant, upper level English words and sentences. Keep the meaning same, but make them more literary. I want you to only reply the correction, the improvements and nothing else, do not write explanations. My first sentence is [istanbulu cok seviyom burada olmak cok guzel]
input1: I adore Istanbul; being here is truly delightful.
input2: My affection for Istanbul knows no bounds; it is a pleasure to be in this magnificent city.
input1_ans: I have a profound affection for Istanbul; my presence here is utterly enchanting.
I have a deep affection for Istanbul; my time here is genuinely enchanting.
input2_ans: My love for Istanbul is boundless; being here is truly a delight.
My love for Istanbul knows no bounds; it is a joy to be in this magnificent city.
